file_content.text: Thanks for what you've done.
Did you do it? Did you get the case? The stash?
I hope you had to kill a lot of Fa'athra's thugs to get this.
This better have been worth it.
Yeah, yeah.
You seem a bit bloodthirsty.
You're eager.
Those thugs murdered my brother! I just hope they got what they deserve.
Now, here--it'll just take... one second... there!
And I enjoyed every minute of it.
Oh, I did.
Good. It'll just take a little twist here to open... one second... there!
The contents are yours. Now please don't bother us again.
I won't rest until they've paid. I won't rest until I have my brother's chrono.
Well, you can rest now.
Then relax.
You should've seen it.
Your brother's death is avenged.
It's done.
Thank you. Thank you very much.
It's a relief to know that, amid all the greed and violence, there's someone on Hutta you can count on.
It just sickened me to think of those thugs practically dancing on my brother's grave. So, again, thank you.
Give those goons what they've got coming. And bring back my brother's chrono!
I'm going to kill them. I'm going to kill them! That's what I'm going to do! I'm gonna take my blaster and--
Oh! Sorry, I, uh, didn't realize you were here. Please, I got nothing left to give you.
I already paid my protection money--please!
I'm not here to hurt you.
Calm down.
I have no idea what you're talking about.
I don't understand.
Listen, Donal. She doesn't look like one of Fa'athra's thugs. Maybe she can help us.
Listen, Donal. He doesn't look like one of Fa'athra's boys. Maybe he can help us.
Listen, Donal. They don't look like Fa'athra's thugs. Maybe they can help us.
Slow down. I'm not volunteering for anything.
Hold on there.
Will somebody please tell me what's going on here?
I'm really confused.
A couple of months ago, my brother and his family started a farm on the other end of the swamps, near Fa'athra's palace.
But when he couldn't afford to pay that slimy Hutt his "protection" money, Fa'athra sent his goons to kill him and his family!
That's why you never trust a Hutt.
Hutts are worthless.
Trust? This wasn't about trust! It was about extortion.
That's life.
You're right, life's hard. Hard enough without Hutts and their greedy, murderous ways.
Maybe someone should have helped your brother pay Fa'athra.
What did you do about it?
You think I don't have my own protection money to pay? Nobody's got anything to spare!
But that ain't the worst of it. Now Fa'athra's goons have set up on my brother's old farm.
Never even bothered to give my brother a proper burying--just left his body for the birds to pick apart.
Please, stranger. We're not fighters, but somebody has to stand up to Fa'athra's thugs. Will you help us?
Tell me what you need me to do.
What do you need?
Is there a reward?
Revenge is my specialty.
It would be a pleasure.
Oh, thank you!
Listen, I don't have anything to give, but my brother stashed a case with valuables in his house in case of hard times.
There's a trick to getting it open, so bring it back to me as proof you got revenge on Fa'athra's thugs, and I'll open it for you.
Okay.
Anything to leave this place.
How did I get roped into this?
This isn't my business.
Fine, if you won't help, then I'll just have to go do it myself.
No, please, Donal! Don't!
Please, don't let my husband do this. He'll get himself killed!
Fine.
I won't let that happen.
Don't worry.
All right. Ma'am, please don't cry.
Fine--for the lady.
I never said I wouldn't do it!
I didn't refuse.
Thank you. It won't bring back my brother, but maybe it'll show those goons that the people of Hutta aren't as powerless as they think.
My brother's farm is near Fa'athra's palace.
He kept his stash hidden in the rafters. Bring it to me and I'll open it for you. The contents are yours.
You can't afford my help.
I don't do charity.
So money's what you want, is it?
Pay up or pay the price.
I don't care.
Please--I already paid this month's protection fee.
I need what little I have left to feed my family... please!
Donal, she doesn't look like one of Fa'athra's thugs.
Then what is she doing here?
Donal, they don't look like Fa'athra's thugs.
Then what are they doing here?
Donal, he doesn't look like one of Fa'athra's thugs.
Then why is he here demanding money?
I'll tell you what you can do. You can go out to my brother's farm. There's a case hidden in the rafters.
Kill as many of Fa'athra's thugs as you need to get it. Bring it here, and you can have the valuables inside.
Sounds good to me.
Okay.
What are Fa'athra's thugs doing at your brother's farm?
I don't understand.
They killed my brother and took over his farm because he couldn't afford to keep paying their extortion fees.
What if I just don't bring the case back?
What if I keep it?
The case is a family heirloom, and I'm the only one alive who knows how to open it, now that Fa'athra's thugs killed my brother.
You want your pay, it's in there.
Those Hutts are criminals, nothing more.
